text: @realDonaldTrump You are really willing to say anything now at this point as long s no one brings up COVID19 #trumplies & the terrible way you handled it. WE are still dealing with death, unemployment & racism while you just move on as if all is well & you’re great. Nope! We’ll remember #byeT

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
